about_me.des: Creative and meticulous Data Scientist with a proven track record of transforming data into actionable insights for strategic decision-making in the industrial sector. Demonstrated expertise in predictive analytics, data visualization, statistics, machine learning, and deep learning.

projects.CD4: Image denoising using Gaussian mixture models and classification algorithms (K-means, Expectation-Maximization). #Python #R #Matlab
projects.d3js: Development of a conversational chatbot based on the BERT architecture | #Python #html #css #javascript #d3js
projects.Oil: Simulation of a Matérn process to understand how grouped data manifest and how different parameters influence their spatial distribution. | #R #Python
projects.geoloc: Implementation of an analysis and prediction algorithm | #Matlab #R #Python
projects.velov: Determining the evolution of bike-sharing in Lyon, descriptive analysis, statistics, and learning on this data. #kafka #spark

Fondasol_des.0: Lead and supervise predictive modeling projects for soil mechanical parameters using machine learning techniques (Random Forest, GAM, neural networks, SVM) and geostatistics (Kriging, co-kriging) to improve analysis accuracy.
Fondasol_des.1: Data analysis and reporting: extract, clean, and format data using R and Python. Conduct descriptive analyses and develop interactive dashboards (R Shiny, Dash, Tableau, Power BI, Streamlit) to effectively communicate results.
Fondasol_des.2: Scientific and technical monitoring: In-depth investigation of scientific articles to extract the latest advances in machine learning, deep learning and geostatistics, and apply them to business challenges.
Fondasol_des.3: Modeling and prediction: Develop and deploy predictive algorithms (R, Python) to simulate soil mechanical parameters in real-time and optimize decision-making.
Fondasol_des.4: Multi-DBMS expertise: Design scalable web applications with PostgreSQL, administer large volumes of enterprise data with Oracle Database and implement complex analytical solutions with IBM Db2.

career.Fondasol_course1: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, R, Python, Time Series Analysis, Data Visualization, R Shiny, Dash, Tableau, Power BI, Streamlit

LIRIS_des.0: Design and implementation of an AI-based conversational agent utilizing deep learning and natural language processing.

career.LIRIS_job: LIRIS (Laboratoire d'InfoRmatique en Image et Systèmes d'information)
career.LIRIS_course1: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Deep learning, Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow
career.master2: Master's Degree in Applied Mathematics, Data Science Specialization

master2_des.0: I chose a specialization in Data Science shared between Mathematics and Computer Science section of the University Lyon 1.

career.master2_course1: Statistical methods and Regression Models, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Graph Complexity and Combinatory, Data Visualization, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine learning
career.master1: Master's Degree (First Year) in Applied Mathematics and Statistics

master1_des.0: Training in applied mathematics and statistics

career.master1_course1: Probability Theory, Statistics, Time Series Analysis, Numerical Analysis and Optimization, Signal Processing

licence_des.0: Solid foundation in mathematics, probability, and statistics
